definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: It occurs where people have to exist on a starchy staple food such as cassava or polished white rice.
sentences.chinese: 以木薯或精白米等淀粉为主食的人群是疾病多发群体。

sentences.english: The wheat has ground down to a fine white flour.
Examples of these foods are applesauce, bananas, white rice, oatmeal, and refined wheat bread.
sentences.chinese: 苹果酱，香蕉，精白米，燕麦粥以及精制小麦面包。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
semipolished rice (i.e. rice minus the husk, but including the germ)
long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice 粳米[jing1 mi3])
